body.name: GAP Women's 2-Pack 3/4 Sleeve Favorite Ballet Tee T-Shirt
features: SOFT JERSEY KNIT: Gap T-SHIRTs for Women feel soft against the skin, thanks to the comfortable jersey knit fabric
¾ LENGTH SLEEVES: Three-quarter length sleeves lend a feminine and sophisticated feel to this Gap Ballet t-shirt
SCOOPNECK: With a classic scoop neckline at the front and low back detail, Gap ballet women’s t-shirts look just as good with a skirt as they do with jeans
MACHINE WASHABLE: Easy to care for, women’s Gap t-shirts can be washed with like colors on the gentle cycle
AMERICAN STYLE FOR ALL AGES: Gap champions a uniquely optimistic sense of American style that bridges the gaps between individuals, generations, and cultures
body.description: A sophisticated classic, Gap Women’s ¾ Sleeve Ballet T-Shirt will be the top you reach for time and time again. With three-quarter length sleeves, a scoop neckline, and feminine low back, this top can easily be dressed up or down. Pair with a flowy skirt and heels for date night or jeans and loafers for brunch with the girls.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DAY TO DAY. WORK TO WEEKEND. SEASON TO SEASON. EVERYDAY TOPS AND TEES Great layered or worn on their own, our wide selection of essential tops and tees come in colors for every day of the week. ESSENTIAL KHAKIS Dress them up or down. With fits and styles for every body, these khakis are made for all walks of life. CLASSIC COATS AND JACKETS From light layers to cozy coats, when it comes to outerwear, we have you covered. STYLISH HOODIES AND SWEATS Our softer-than-soft sweats. Made to be your new everywhere, always-on essentials.

BUILD A WARDROBE THAT ALWAYS FITS YOUR STYLE. Men's Essential Slim Khakis Women's Fitted Cami Top Women's Basic Leggings THE ESSENTIAL SLIM FIT Lean but never tight, made from a smooth cotton twill with GapFlex stretch THE CLASSIC CAMISOLE This camisole keeps its shape all day long and is a great layering piece. THE ESSENTIAL LEGGINGS Our basic leggings have a mid rise fit and slim silhouette. CLASSIC DETAILS These flat front chino trousers have a stretch waist for all day comfort. STRAIGHT, SLIM FIT This tank hugs the lines of your body for a fit that feels as good as it looks. STRETCH JERSEY KNIT These stretch pants are made of a soft jersey knit for comfort all day long. BUTTON CLOSURE AND ZIP FLY These pants feature a heavy duty zipper and button closure. SOFT JERSEY KNIT Made from soft and stretchy cotton jersey MACHINE WASHABLE These leggings can be washed with like colors on gentle cycle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fine basic shirt
reviews.reviewText: I get the distinct impression that most of the reviewers here are confused as to what a ballet neck shirt entails. In short, this style of top has a high-cut neck in front and a lower scoop neck in back, similar to a leotard (hence ballet neck). The back scoop on this shirt is pretty modest, but to reiterate, the shirt is NOT printed backwards; you guys are wearing your shirts backwards.As far as quality, this is pretty much exactly what I expect from modern Gap. The fabric is a bit thin, but not to the point of tissue paper; however, you'll want to wash on delicate if you want them to last. I wouldn't buy these at full price, but on sale it's a good deal. The one nice thing about the back not being all that low is that it is very bra-friendly, even if you don't get to show off your shoulders as much. If you like a bit of room in your tops you might want to consider sizing up. I wear a size L in most brands and decided to go with an XL for comfort, which for me was the right decision--it's loose without being baggy when going that route, but if you like form-fitting tops I'd say it's otherwise true to size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a tunic!
reviews.reviewText: Like fabric and style. Neckline is nice however is more fitted than I would like. I did order small as so many items are really large for size. Order moral size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor material and tag placement--could have been reversible
reviews.reviewText: I copied Siobhan Mckenney's review (...literally). She expressed it exactly as I intended.Bad piecing, fit is off. Feels like outlet.Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023Verified PurchaseThis is supposed to be a boatneck neckline with a scoop in the back. Except the shirt is effectively sewn as if the scoop is meant to be worn in front - the shoulder seams are too far forward for the shirt to be worn as a boatneck. Fits much more naturally worn backwards, but oops! The tag printing is directly on the shirt, and the material is thin enough to notice the print showing through. This feels like the lower grade, badly made outlet stuff that Gap releases with their label. Not worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These tops are poorly designed and do not fit well at all. I was also expecting the fabric to have more softness and stretch, but it did not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wear them backwards
reviews.reviewText: These tops are designed to be worn with the scoop in the back because the GAP logo is printed on the scoop side. Here’s a big BUT, they feel a lot more comfortable wearing the scoop in the front. It feels like it’s pulling my neck back if I wear it with the boat style neck in front. So, if you can get over this, it’s a great fitting top with just enough stretch to be comfortable, not tight. Ignore the logo, because once you put it on, you can’t see it and it doesn’t show through once it’s against your skin. Even the photos show the scoop in the front…crazy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looked small initially, but is soft as butter and fits perfectly! The material is soft, has plenty of stretch, and rebounds perfectly. No pinches, gaps, and wears very well! Highly recommend for women who like tee-shirt feel with 3/4” sleeves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a snug fit
reviews.reviewText: The fabric is nice but I prefer thinner material. It's a very classy tshirt though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Bad piecing, fit is off. Feels like outlet.
reviews.reviewText: This is supposed to be a boatneck neckline with a scoop in the back. Except the shirt is effectively sewn as if the scoop is meant to be worn in front - the shoulder seams are too far forward for the shirt to be worn as a boatneck. Fits much more naturally worn backwards, but oops! The tag printing is directly on the shirt, and the material is thin enough to notice the print showing through. This feels like the lower grade, badly made outlet stuff that Gap releases with their label. Not worth it.

Después de medio día de uso, la tela ya se estiró. Y sigue la duda del cuello, si uso la blusa con el cuello V al frente, se ve la etiqueta. Si la uso para atrás, se siente rara la prenda. Las hubiera regresado pero les quité las etiquetas antes de tiempo.
